bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I like to buzz. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I like to visit flowers.
🍯 I make honey.
🐝 I start with the letter 'B'.

bug.question: I am red with black spots. I'm considered lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 My spots help me hide.
🌱 I eat tiny bugs on plants.
🔴 I am mostly red in color.

bug.question: I like to crawl and carry big crumbs to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I live in a colony.
💪 I am very strong for my size.
🚶 I am a small, hard-working insect.

bug.question: I jump very high and like to eat grass. What am I?

hints.text: 🦗 I make a chirping sound.
💚 I am usually green.
🌱 I'm often found in fields.

bug.question: I start out as a caterpillar, then build a cocoon and fly away. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I am colorful and beautiful.
🐛 I go through metamorphosis.
🌸 I like to flutter around flowers.

bug.question: I glow in the dark. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 I use bioluminescence.
🌙 You can see me best at night.
✨ I am a small flying bug.

bug.question: I live in a big group and build my home out of dirt. I'm known for liking picnics. What am I?

hints.text: 🏕️ I am a common uninvited picnic guest.
🏘️ We build tunnels underground.
🐜 We are small and have six legs.

bug.question: I have a long body with many legs, but I'm not an insect. What am I?

hints.text: 💯 I have more than 20 legs.
🍂 I am often found under rocks and logs.
🐛 My name means 'hundred legs'.

bug.question: I am a bug that chews on wood, making tunnels inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I can damage houses.
🐜 I look like a white ant.
🏡 I am often treated with special chemicals.

bug.question: I am a tiny bug that can jump very far and sometimes bites. What am I?

hints.text: 🐶 Pets can get me.
🚰 I don't like being wet.
🔴 I am very small and can be a nuisance.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I come out during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very hot!
💛 I am yellow and round.
😎 I give you light and warmth.

cosmos.question: I am round and you live on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 Plants and trees grow on me.
💧 I have lots of water.
🌎 People live all over me.

cosmos.question: I come out at night and I shine with reflected light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I am a circle, sometimes a sliver.
🐺 Werewolves like to howl at me.
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.

cosmos.question: I am a very, very hot ball of gas far, far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle in the night sky.
🔭 You need a telescope to see me clearly.
☀️ The Sun is one of me.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball that goes around the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 Earth is one of me.
🚀 You can travel to me in a spaceship.
☄️ Some of us have rings around us.

cosmos.question: I am made of icy dust and rock, and I have a tail when I get close to the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ People think I bring bad luck.
❄️ I come from the cold parts of space.
💨 My tail always points away from the sun.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that makes a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some people call me The Great Bear.
✨ You can see me at night if you look carefully.
🏺The Big Dipper is a part of me.

cosmos.question: I am a big, big group of stars, dust, and gas, held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 Our Sun is part of me.
🥛 Mine is called the Milky Way.
🌀 I am shaped like a spiral or an oval.

cosmos.question: I am a group of planets that goes around a star. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ Earth is part of one.
👨‍🚀 It takes a long time to travel around me.
🪐 Mine has eight planets.

cosmos.question: I am a place in space where gravity pulls so much that even light can't get out. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I suck everything in!
🌌 I am found in the middle of most galaxies.
🕳️ You can't see me, only what I do.
